channel.title: Can't eat during combat
channel.description: I'm using tonypker13's server and while i'm fighting i can't eat, I PMed him but he won't tell me how so can you guys tell me what to do?

item.title: Can't eat during combat
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I can’t , it’s too difficult will you fix the error for me pls?
download it and then send it fixed, pls i will rep
http://uppit.com/VI75X3

Read full topic

item.title: Can't eat during combat
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public long FoodDelay;

Search for packet 122, and replace it with this;

case 122: int interfaace = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int ItemSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int ItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); if (playerItems[ItemSlot] == ItemID + 1 && System.currentTimeMillis() - FoodDelay > 2499 && !IsDead) { CheckForSkillUse3(ItemID, ItemSlot); } break;

Now search for;

CheckForSkillUse3

Before the switch statement begins, add these;

boolean GoOn = true, eat = false; int heal = 0

Now scroll down to where your foods are located, and replace them all with;

[code] case 315:
sendMsg(“You eat the shrimps.”);
eat = true;
heal = 3;
break;

	case 379:
		sendMsg("You eat the lobster.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 12;
		break;

	case 385:
		sendMsg("You eat the shark.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 20;
		break;

	case 7946:
		sendMsg("You eat the monkfish.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 16;
		break;

	case 6685:
		sendMsg("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 16;
		break;

	case 6687:
		sendMsg("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 16;
		break;

	case 6689:
		sendMsg("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 16;
		break;

	case 6691:
		sendMsg("You drink a dose of the foul liquid.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 16;
		break;

	case 391:
		sendMsg("You eat the manta ray.");
		eat = true;
		heal = 24;
		break;[/code]

Now scroll down to the end of the method, and just before the boolean is returned as true, add;

if (eat) { anim(829); deleteItem(Item, Slot, 1); if (playerLevel[3] < getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) { if (Item == 385 || Item == 391 || Item == 7946 || Item == 379 || Item == 315) { sendMsg("It heals some health."); } } NewHP += heal; if (NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])) NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); if (Item == 6685) { sendMsg("You have 3 doses of potion left."); addItem(6687, 1); } if (Item == 6687) { sendMsg("You have 2 doses of potion left."); addItem(6689, 1); } if (Item == 6689) { sendMsg("You have 1 dose of potion left."); addItem(6691, 1); } if (Item == 6691) { sendMsg("You have finished the potion."); addItem(229, 1); } PkingDelay = 6; IsDead = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } FoodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();

Fix it to work with your server base.

Read full topic
